oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. John Drew McClanahan to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Pvt. John Drew McClanahan, Co. C, 9th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, to his father after Shiloh. Recounting his work in Corinth, he writes, "The whole army is at work; and the boys work in earnest like they were working for themselvesNo doubt, but we are on the eve of a bloody battle. The boys are all in high spirits, and sanguine of success."
